name: Compilation B
overview: Atari Corp UK released this compilation cassette in 1987. This cassette contains re-releases of the Atari Corp. games Realsport Tennis, Basketball, RealSport Football, Computer Chess and Chop Suey from the English Software Company. Each Atari Corp. game features a loading screen by Atari Corp UK which states the copyright date of 1987. Side A: Tennis, Chop Suey. Side B: Realsport Basketball, Football, Chess.
